name: I love Italian Street Food
description: Experience Italian street food from different Italian regions

items.name: Gnocco Fritto
items.description: Fried dough, caramelized onion, cold cuts and stracchino cheese

items.name: Roman Pizzette
items.description: Three Type of Roman Pizzette (Marinara and Parsely sauce, Potato & Sausage and Stracciatella with Homemade pesto

items.name: Mix of Bruschette
items.description: Homemade pistacchio pesto, burrata and mortadella. Cherry tomato & basil. Stracchino & sausage

items.name: Focaccia
items.description: Crispy pinsa romana with rosemary and fennel seeds

items.name: Pesto Focaccia
items.description: Homemade pesto, crispy pinsa romana with rosemary and fennel seeds

items.name: Italian Crispy chicken
items.description: Pinsa romana, fried chicken, eggplants, zucchini pesto and cheese

items.name: Genovese Gnocchi
items.description: Homemade gnocchi and pesto with pistacchio, parmiggiano and sundried tomato

items.name: Bolognese Gnocchi
items.description: Homemade gnocchi, tomato, beef & pork bolognese

items.name: Penne Amatriciana
items.description: Penne with guanciale, onion, tomato, pecorino and parmiggiano

items.name: Carbonara
items.description: Eggs, guanciale, pecorino or parmiggiano, black pepper

items.name: Napolitan Pizzette
items.description: Perfect combo of napolita pizzette style. Margerita, Bresaola and Pecorino and Homemade Pistacchio Pesto, Burrata and Mortadella

items.name: Chef's Special Feast
items.description: A curated selection of signature dishes chosen by Chef Luca, featuring seasonal ingredients and traditional recipes

items.name: Regional Feast
items.description: A celebration of a specific Italian region's culinary traditions, rotating monthly

items.name: Family Style Feast
items.description: Large sharing platters of Chef Luca's most beloved recipes, perfect for family-style dining
